review: I was came here for denture.. dr.nikhil suggested me for implant supported fix denture.As I  didn't want loose denture so I choose this option for permanent solution.. he put implants in my mouth very properly , no having any pain or discomfort..After 3 months he fixed denture on it..M very much happy with my denture.. Thank you dr.nikhil. would recommend everyone this dr.for all kind of dental problems.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was know about that clinic from my one of my friend..  I had gap between the front teeth & it didn't look good when m smiling..dr.nikhil advice me to choose the option whether braces treatment or having crowns..As I had no more time to come every month for braces treatment so I choose 2nd option...Thank you dr.to help me to choose good option as my convinince..he did very nicely smile designing...& Result was excellent it's looks natural & perfect smile I got now.

review: My experience with Dr.Nikhil was great.the treatment ended on times with no pain. Dr. Nikhil was careful and considerate throughout the treatment. Discussed the whole procedure in advance and made me feel comfortable. The cap he gave me was of good quality. I have no issues so far its been 6 months post treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: He such a kind and gentle person. I felt very confident and secure in his care. I felt like I was the only patient today. I appreciate how well he took care of me.Very gentle and explains what he is doing and ensures that I am comfortable. I remember since my childhood when I was 12 year old I have a phobia for removal of my teeth even multiple times I ran out from the dental clinic.Today I am 26 year old and on his trust and the way he conduct everything I was able to start treatment which is painless compare to other dentist.Hope for the best results!!
